thread.title: John McDonnell promises not to score political points if Osborne U-turns on tax credit cuts
thread.title_full: John McDonnell promises not to score political points if Osborne U-turns on tax credit cuts - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: John McDonnell promises not to score political points if Osborne U-turns on tax credit cuts
text: Labour’s shadow chancellor has promised not to make “political capital” out of any prospective Government U-turn on tax credits. John McDonnell said he would support George Osborne if the Chancellor brought forward meaningful proposals to reverse the cuts. “I’ve written to George Osborne to say ‘look, I know what a U-turn looks like and how it can damage you, but we need a U-turn on this one’. So I’ve said to him, look, if you can change your mind on this, we will not make any political capital out of this,” he told BBC One’s Andrew Marr Show. Read more
